name: KART CHASER : THE BOOST VR
description: Shout out to all racing fans! ‘KART CHASER: THE BOOST’ has finally made it to the VR world! Immerse yourself in the virtual reality world, take the wheel and feel the thrill of the most realistic kart racing that you've ever seen!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
